Plantkos Skincare Phyto Exfoliating Cleanser

Brand: Plantkos

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sucrose Cocoate, Sodium Benzoate, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit/Leaf Extract

) Fruit/Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Allantoin, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu

ella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
